meanings.definition: The alteration of something from its original course, meaning, or state to a distortion or corruption.
meanings.sent1: The perversion of the story turned it into a confusing mess.
meanings.sent2: His perversion of the facts led to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent3: The perversion of the game rules made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The perversion of justice in the movie shocked the audience.
meanings.sent5: The perversion of nature in the painting was both eerie and fascinating.

meanings.definition: A sexual behavior or desire that is considered abnormal or deviant.
meanings.sent1: She was disgusted by his perverse actions.
meanings.sent3: The perversion in the movie was unnecessary and silly.
meanings.sent4: The perversion of love in the novel was heartbreaking.
meanings.sent5: The perversion of desire in the play was intense and unsettling.

meanings.definition: The act of perverting or corrupting something.
meanings.sent1: The perversion of the data led to incorrect conclusions.
meanings.sent2: His perversion of the truth damaged his reputation.
meanings.sent3: The perversion of the recipe resulted in a strange dish.
meanings.sent4: The perversion of the system caused chaos.
meanings.sent5: The perversion of the melody transformed it into a haunting tune.
